content: this deeply textured crochet hat is a wonderful choice for warmth and seasonal style stitched in 2 tones of red heart super saver it s fun to do the 3d stitch that makes up the cushy fabric easily replace the 2 bold color sections with shades that appeal to you learn chain double_crochet double_crochet front post and double_crochet back post techniques topped with a perfect pompom it s a stylish accessory for the avid fashionista s 2-4 yrs m 6-10 yrs l adult to fit head circumference 18 20- 22 / 45 5 51-56 cm yarns for model red heart super saver™ 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m contrast a aran 0313 1 ball contrast b gray heather 0400 1 ball
